entry.title: $1800 // Your OWN studio in an amazing location ( furnised)
entry.content:
Hello! Please READ before to apply!

I have a 1 bedroom apartment on 70th street and 2 avenue. The place has been transformed into a studio ( meaning their is only a kitchen, bathroom and bedroom NO LIVING ROOM).

The living room is now my art atelier where I keep my work and come from times to time to create some pieces.

YOU WILL BE LIVING BY YOURSELF BUT I WILL COME FROM TIME TO TIME TO WORK, like once a week sometimes even less.

The art atelier is separated with a curtain. You will have YOUR OWN BEDROOM, KITCHEN AND BATHROOM.

The place is in an amazing location, the subway is down the building, not even 1 block away! Walgreens is in front of the building and laundry as well.

Like I said I won't be sleeping here but only coming sometimes for work only. I won't be in your personal space at all but JUST IN THE ATELIER THAT IS ON THE OTHER SIDE OF THE APARTMENT SEPARATED BY A CURTAIN.

I AM LOOKING FOR SOMEONE CLEAN, WHO WON'T BRING THE PARTY TO THIS PLACE, SOMEONE RESPECTFUL EASY GOING AND SERIOUS.

I am asking 1 month rent 1800 DOLLARS and 1 month deposit only. ( the utilities will be paid separately )

Thank you !

PS: The pics show what you will be getting and what is yours only. Please reply with a short description about yourself, I will be showing the place soon.
